t:
There was something different about the old life-sized family portrait on the wall.
It was odd that the boy in the picture was holding a hammer.



Today I found the glass on the picture broken and the boy missing.
c:
A trail of blood led to the basement...


A quest for the readers â€” expand and continue this story in the comments.
